title: Unencrypted S3 Bucket
description: S3 bucket lacks server-side encryption, exposing sensitive artifacts to potential unauthorized access
reasoning: No encryption configuration means data is stored in plaintext, vulnerable to unauthorized read access

title: Unrestricted SSH Access
description: Security group allows SSH access from any IP address (0.0.0.0/0)
reasoning: Allows potential brute force and unauthorized remote access attempts from any global IP

title: Overly Broad IAM Role Assumption
description: IAM role allows EC2 service to assume role without additional restrictions
reasoning: Allows any EC2 instance in the account to potentially assume this role, violating least-privilege principle
